profileText: a Representative from Colorado; born in Grand Junction, Mesa County, Colo., August 15, 1979; graduated from Grand Junction High School, Grand Junction, Colo., 1997; B.A., University of Notre Dame, Notre Dame, Ind., 2001; J.D., University of Denver, Denver Colo., 2008; L.L.M., Columbia University, New York, N.Y., 2010; lawyer; law clerk, United States Court of Appeals, Tenth Circuit; chair, Board of Directors of the Grand Junction Area Chamber of Commerce, Grand Junction, Colo.; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress (January 3, 2025-present).
